alert.note: Alert for Hartford; Tolland; Windham (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 10:27PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Heavy showers and a few embedded thunderstorms will impact portions of Windham, Tolland, Hartford, southwestern Worcester, southeastern Hampshire, southeastern Franklin and Hampden Counties through 1115 PM EDT... At 1024 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a line of heavy showers and a few embedded thunderstorms across southwest Massachusetts and northern Connecticut, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. Brief heavy rain may also result in typical nuisance poor drainage street flooding. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Springfield, Hartford, New Britain, West Hartford, Bristol, Manchester, Chicopee, East Hartford, Enfield, Southington, Westfield, Holyoke, Amherst, Glastonbury, Newington, Vernon, Windsor, Northampton, Agawam and West Springfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.
